thread.title: Sherlock Holmes: The Complete Collection, free Kindle edition
thread.title_full: Sherlock Holmes: The Complete Collection, free Kindle edition

author: Mark Frauenfelder
title: Sherlock Holmes: The Complete Collection, free Kindle edition
text: A couple of weeks ago I alerted you to the fact that the complete collection of Conan the Barbarian by Robert E. Howard was available as a free Kindle edition. You have probably read all 853-pages by now and are hungry for more stuff to read. Here you go: The Complete Sherlock Holmes by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, weighing in at 1136 pages, is also available as a free Kindle edition. Happy reading!
